body: Thanks for the contribution, this looks pretty good. Can you add a regression test to make sure the code is correct? You can use https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/conv2d_backprop_filter_grad_test.py#L25 as an example.
